data: “Oh, but this is terrible!” cried Simon Dubosc. “Edward, just listen!”
"Oh, but this is terrible!" cried Simon Dubosc. "Edward, just listen!"
Leblanc, Maurice, 1864-1941; Teixeira de Mattos, Alexander, 1865-1921 [Translator]
